meanings.definition: A plug of sebum in a hair follicle, typically found on the face or back.
meanings.sent1: I noticed a comedo on my nose while looking in the mirror.
meanings.sent2: Dermatologists often recommend gentle exfoliation to prevent comedos.
meanings.sent3: Why did the comedo go to the party? To get squeezed out of the follicle!
meanings.sent4: The comedo was like a tiny traffic jam in my skin's street.
meanings.sent5: The comedo resembled a tiny cork blocking the hair follicle's opening.

meanings.definition: A type of skin blemish caused by a clogged pore.
meanings.sent1: Her skincare routine helped reduce the appearance of comedos on her face.
meanings.sent2: The comedo formed when excess oil mixed with dead skin cells in the pore.
meanings.sent3: Why did the comedo break up with the blackhead? It needed some space!
meanings.sent4: The comedo was a stubborn guest overstaying its welcome on my skin.
meanings.sent5: The comedo looked like a tiny dark spot trying to escape from the pore.
